statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation_data;
SELECT customer_name, segment, age FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE segment = 'Premium' ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, segment, age, gender, last_purchase_date, total_spent FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE segment = 'premium' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, gender, total_spent FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE segment IN ('basic', 'premium') ORDER BY age LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customer_segmentation_data WHERE total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC, age ASC
SELECT segment, AVG(age) AS average_age, AVG(total_spent) AS average_total_spent FROM customer_segmentation_data GROUP BY segment ORDER BY segment
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Promotions WHERE target_segment = 'High Value Customers';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM Promotions WHERE promotion_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_id, segment_name FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Promotions WHERE target_segment = 'Premium' OR target_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM Promotions ORDER BY promotion_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, segment_name, segment_description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_segment = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE target_segment = 'New Customers';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_segment = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;

SELECT customers.customer_name, purchases.purchase_amount, purchases.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE target_segment IN ('Premium', 'VIP');
SELECT * FROM customer_segments LIMIT 10
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_type, discount_amount FROM promotion_data WHERE discount_amount > 50
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name = 'VIP'
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE end_date > DATE('now')
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_segments JOIN targeted_campaigns ON customer_segments.customer_id = targeted_campaigns.segment_id GROUP BY segment_name
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_type, discount_amount FROM promotion_data WHERE expiry_date > DATE('now') ORDER BY promotion_id ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_segment FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT cp.customer_name, ph.purchase_amount, ph.purchase_date FROM CustomerProfiles cp INNER JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY ph.purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT cf.feedback_text, cf.feedback_rating, cp.customer_name FROM CustomerFeedback cf INNER JOIN CustomerProfiles cp ON cf.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cf.feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY cp.customer_name ASC;
SELECT ct.campaign_name, ct.campaign_start_date, ct.campaign_end_date FROM CampaignTracking ct WHERE ct.campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY ct.campaign_end_date DESC;

SELECT pp.promotion_type, pp.promotion_description, cp.customer_name FROM PromotionHistory pp INNER JOIN CustomerProfiles cp ON pp.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE pp.promotion_type = 'Discount' ORDER BY cp.customer_name ASC;
